alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 25 at 8:49AM CDT until June 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Rockport. * WHEN...From Monday evening to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Widespread flooding of low pastureland and bottomland is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 24.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Rockport 25.0 24.2 Sun 8 am CDT 24.9 24.9 24.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CDT.
